title: All 32 - Los Angeles Chargers: Transitioning from Philip Rivers to Tyrod Taylor/Justin Herbert with Daniel Popper (Football 6/24)
description:
Time to talk about Will Brinson's ex. The Los Angeles Chargers have moved on from Philip Rivers (2:00) and Daniel Popper of The Athletic joins 'All 32' to break down the team's new era. Was there any surprise over the selection of Justin Herbert (3:30)? How far can Tyrod Taylor take them this season before turning the team over to the Top-10 pick (7:00)? Daniel thinks the Chargers might have the best defense in football and Brinson doesn't even think that's a crazy statement (12:00). 2020 and beyond (18:00) is broken down in this episode.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @danielrpopper
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
